thread.title: Stand-Up Comedian Vir Das To Be The First Indian To Have His Show On Netflix
thread.title_full: Stand-Up Comedian Vir Das To Be The First Indian To Have His Show On Netflix

title: Stand-Up Comedian Vir Das To Be The First Indian To Have His Show On Netflix
text:
Feb 22, 2017 at 10:31 Stand-Up Comedian Vir Das To Be The First Indian To Have His Show On Netflix 
The poster of actor-comedian Vir Das' Netflix special has been released. Image Source: Instagram/Vir Das The 37-year-old stand-up comic has now become the first Indian ever to have a global show on the online streaming network. "Excited that the Netflix special will be out soon in April. I'm honoured to be the first Indian to be featured for a Netflix special and the feeling is beyond words for me," said Das. 
The actor said he had a great time performing for a massive live audience and is excited about the trailer for the upcoming web series. "The trailer will be coming out soon. Shooting for the special was a surreal experience with such a big live crowd and the response was phenomenal. Being on a platform like Netflix is extremely rewarding for me as an artist," Das continued. 
The comedy series will release in April 2017.
